title: Just one of the boys
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Conservation and restoration
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blindness
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physically handicapped
description: A profile of Eric Davidson, who has been totally blind since the age of two, a victim of the 1917 Halifax explosion. Despite his blindness, Mr. Davidson has spent the past twenty years as a full-time automotive mechanic for the city of Halifax. He is actively involved in the restoration and rebuilding of antique cars and is a well known member of the Antique Car Club.
